TELEGRAM_NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_TEXT: You don't have enough money. A telegram costs %f$
TELEGRAM_SENT_TEXT: You've sent a telegram and paid %f$.
TELEGRAM_RECEIVED_TEXT: You've received a telegram. Go to your nearest Post Office to retrieve it.
TELEGRAM_RETRIEVED_TEXT: You've saved a telegram. You can re-read it at any time from your inventory.
NUI_TELEGRAM_LEGAL_NOTICE: This company TRANSMITS and DELIVERS messages only on conditions limiting its liability subject to the terms and condtions printed on the back of this note.
NUI_TELEGRAM_MESSAGE_NOTICE: These messages are sent and received subject to the Post and Telegraph Act and Regulations. The time received at this office is shown at the end of the message. The date stamp indicates the date both of lodgement and reception unless otherwise shown after the particulars of time lodged.
NUI_TELEGRAM_SERIVCE_TEXT: Engaging with our sophisticated telegram mail service requires a nominal investment of $ for each telegram dispatched. This cost has been structured to ensure that we maintain the highest possible standards of service, including prompt delivery and unparalleled communication security.
NUI_TELEGRAM_FOOTER_TEXT: The postal companyâ€™s system reaches all important points in New Cumbernauld and via commercial cables, all the world.
